trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around December 25th 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsmy cousin (who is a skeptic) and i were standing outsid on my street in dc, when i looked up and saw a strange object flying in the sky. it was strange because there were no signal lights and it seemed to be engulfed in fire. it was traveling in a curved path heading south by southwest, moving slowly and without noise until it came to a vault above us. the craft hovered for about a minute and then sped off west\northwest at what seemed like a much after pace than it had previously moved.... it dissapeared of into the distance in seconds!!!! all with out making any sound.... right after that, a hellicopter flew through the same airspace with it's searchlights on... it too went off in the same direction.
Summary: Standing outside, my cousin and I saw what looked like a ball of flame flying that then it stopped, waited an turned to fly the other direction.
